body_html:
I'm also seeing my pytorch hang when turning on more than one GPU.
I'm on an ec2 p2 (K80) machine with the ubuntu deep learning AMI.
The p2pBandwidthLatencyTest seems to run fine, with all the GPUs able to communicate with each other.

body:
I'm also seeing my pytorch hang when turning on more than one GPU.
I'm on an ec2 p2 (K80) machine with the ubuntu deep learning AMI.
The p2pBandwidthLatencyTest seems to run fine, with all the GPUs able to communicate with each other.
